messages.fileNotFound: Couldn't find file ${filePath}. Is the 'srcFolder' in your roundup.json correct?
messages.fileNotRenderedDueToUnmatchingFolderName: WARNING: ${file} can not be rendered because it doesn't live in a folder with the same name.
messages.htmlValidationFailed: HTML validation failed. Most likely something went wrong with https://validator.w3.org/nu/. Maybe you also ran into rate limiting.
messages.missingExtension: ERROR: Please specify the file extension of your components in roundup.json (key: 'extension', type: String)
messages.missingSrcFolder: ERROR: Please specify the location of your components in roundup.json (key: 'srcFolder', type: String)
messages.missingEngine: ERROR: Please specify your javascript engine in roundup.json (key: 'engine', type: String)
messages.settingEngineFailed: ERROR: Setting the rendering engine failed. Are you sure the engine defined in your roundup.json is correct?
messages.roundupJsonNotFound: ERROR: Couldn't find the file roundup.json.
